attributes.background:
Winter fuel payments would make a huge difference and would mean disabled people  wouldn't have to worry about costs."
winter fuel payments are not given to those most in need.
They are only given to people who are 6o and over and there are lots of people  who are disabled in the u.k. who are suffering with out no heating because  they cant afford to use it .

rejection.details: Please change the main sentence "winter fuel payments" to an action for HM Government e.g. "extend winter fuel payments".
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
